article_title: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh says sons killed in air strike.
sentence: Hamas  leader  Ismail  Haniyeh  says  sons  killed  in  air  strike.

article_title: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh says sons killed in air strike.
sentence: Hamas  leader  Ismail  Haniyeh  has  confirmed  to  Arabic  media  that  three  of  his  sons  have  been  killed  in  an  air  strike  in  Gaza.

article_title: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh says sons killed in air strike.
sentence: It  follows  reports  in  a  Hamas-affiliated  news  agency  in  Gaza  that  three  sons  -  Hazem,  Amir,  and  Muhammad  Ismail  Haniyeh  -  and  several  of  his  grandchildren  had  died  in  the  strike  in  Beach  refugee  camp  in  the  west  of  Gaza  City.

article_title: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh says sons killed in air strike.
sentence: These  are  not  the  first  members  of  Haniyeh's  family  to  have  been  killed  in  the  war  -  another  son  was  reportedly  killed  in  February,  while  his  brother  and  nephew  were  killed  in  October,  followed  by  a  grandson  in  November.
